address.addressline: Oregon Historical Society Davies Family Research Library

did.abstract: Collection includes: 54 plans, elevations and details on 14 sheets of the George L. Curry house in Wilsonville, Oregon, scale: 3/4" : 1' to 1:1, recorded 1934. A native of Philadephia, George Law Curry (1820-1878) lived on his parents' farm near Harrisburg, Penn., until the death of his father in 1829.

bioghist.p: A native of Philadephia, George Law Curry (1820-1878) lived on his parents' farm near Harrisburg, Penn., until the death of his father in 1829.

scopecontent.p: Collection includes: 54 plans, elevations and details on 14 sheets of the George L. Curry house in Wilsonville, Oregon, scale: 3/4" : 1' to 1:1, recorded 1934.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to the public.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society is the owner of the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library prior to any use of reproductions. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use of reproductions may require seeking additional authorization from the copyright holders.

prefercite.p: George L. Curry Residence Plans, Mss 3100, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.

separatedmaterial.p: George Law Curry letters, Mss 700, Oregon Historical Society Research Library,Portland, Or.

relatedmaterial.p: George Law Curry letters, Mss 700, Oregon Historical Society Research Library,Portland, Or.
